fact-1.value: At Centrica, we have been at the forefront of supporting homes, businesses and communities with their energy needs for more than 200 years. We remain focused on giving customers what they want and need through our purpose of helping our customers live sustainably, simply and affordably.  At the heart of this, is our talented team of 20,000 colleagues including 7,000 engineers, who serve millions of customers every day through trusted brands like British Gas, Bord Gáis Energy and Centrica Business Solutions. And central to it, is our commitment to provide responsible energy our customers can rely on. Alongside this, we’re investing in our communities and creating the diverse and inclusive team we need for a greener future.In doing so, we can add value for all of our stakeholders.
